short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The New tab with a more personalized page with Greeting, Background Image & Inspirational Quotes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The New Customize Chrome tab with a more personalized page with Greeting, Background Image & Inspirational Quotes. Each time you open a new tab, Greatly will show you new background photo and quotes. You can change the background image instantly by clicking on change button.

We provide daily refreshments with our collection of amazing nature photos, inspirational quotes.

Features:
• Beautiful photos in every new tab.
• Inspirational quotes.
• Personalized Greeting.


Note: For the best experience, after installing Greatly click the ‘Keep it’ button on the ‘Change back to Google’ notification.
